message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, I think the product is a bit pricey at $200. I'm willing to pay $120 for it, considering it's worth $150 to you. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $200 represents my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $170. I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
